file_content.text: I can never thank you enough for saving my daughter's life.
Oh. Hello. You must be one of the Jedi. My name is Bahlea, how do you do.
I don't mean to be rude, but I'd rather not talk for long. My daughter is very sick, and I'm all she has since my husband died.
I found a holorecording on your husband's body. He said these Manka cat teeth would help your daughter.
I've come to help.
How did you know your husband was dead?
You found out?
A hunting dog wandered into camp with... I don't want to share the details. Now if you'll--
Are those Manka cat teeth? You brought these for my daughter? These will cure her....
I did what your husband couldn't. These Manka cat teeth are for your daughter.
Lucky for you, I came along.
You brought these teeth for my daughter? Oh... this is what the doctor needs, to make her medicine....
I... I'm overwhelmed. I don't know what to say.
Happy to help.
How about "thank you."
You could be grateful.
I hope you're going to tell me there's a reward.
Don't say, just pay.
I... you should be rewarded for this. Yes, uh... wait, I know. Yes, you should have this.
It was my husband's. It served him well, and now that you have saved my daughter's life... I hope it serves you well also.
Thank you so much. I've... I've got to tell the doctor right away so that he can make Rusa's medicine.
You'll have to excuse me. I'm afraid I'm not very good company at the moment.
